Transform data Activities can be used to process and transform data in computer environments such as Azure data bricks or Azure HDInsight or Azure Data lake Analytics etc.

databricks python activity

1. Dataflow feature in Azure data factory will allow you to develop graphical data transformation logic that can be executed as activities in ADF pipelines.
2. your data flow will execute on your own Azure Data Bricks cluster for scaled out data processing using spark.
3. ADF internally handles all the code translation, spark optimization and execution of transformation.

1. Switch Activity provides the same functionality that switch statement provides in programming languages.
2. It evaluates a set of activities corresponding to a case that matches the condition evalution.
